      • getPlayerSet

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Player> getPlayerSet()
        This method obtains a hash map which contains all player information.

      • setPlayerSet

        This method modifies player set.
        参数:
        playerSet - A hash map which contains all player information.

      • getCountries

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Country> getCountries()
        This method obtains a hash map storing all countries which are in the map.
        返回:
        A hash map stores all countries which are in the map.

      • setCountries

        public void setCountries(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Country> countries)
        This method modified a hash map storing all countries which are in the map.
        参数:
        countries - A new hash map storing all countries which are in the map.

      • getContinents

      • setContinents

        Ths method modified a hash map storing all continents which are in the map.
        参数:

      • getPlayerNum

        public int getPlayerNum()
        This method obtains the number of player.
        返回:
        The number of player.

      • addData

        public void addData(int playerNum,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Country> countries,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Continent> continents)
        This method adding data to playerNum, countries, continents.
        参数:
        playerNum - The number of players.
        countries - A hash map storing all countries which are in the map.
        continents - A hash map storing all continents which are in the map.

      • initPhase

        public void initPhase()
        This method invokes judgePlayerNum(), initializePlayerSet(), initializePlayerSet(), initializeCountries() to implement game's initializing phase.

      • Startup

        public void Startup(java.lang.String pname,
                    java.lang.String couname)
        This method implemrnts player allocated the number of initial armies.
        参数:
        pname - Player name.
        couname - Country name.

      • Reinforcement

        public void Reinforcement()
        This method implements Reinforcement phase.

      • SystemArmy

        public int SystemArmy(java.lang.String player)
        This method calculating the number of reinforcement armies.
        参数:
        player - Player name.
        返回:
        The number of reinforcement armies.

      • ContinentArmy

        public int ContinentArmy(java.lang.String player)
        This method judges a play whether occupies a continent or not. If yes, then player get control value, otherwise.
        参数:
        player - Player name.
        返回:
        Control value.

      • Fortification

        public void Fortification(java.lang.String from,
                          java.lang.String to,
                          int move)
        This method a valid fortification.
        参数:
        from - Starting country.
        to - Target country.
        move - The number of armies to be moved.
